001package org.consensusj.bitcoin.json.conversion;
002
003import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException;
004import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.DeserializationContext;
005import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.KeyDeserializer;
006import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.exc.InvalidFormatException;
007import org.bitcoinj.base.Address;
008import org.bitcoinj.base.AddressParser;
009import org.bitcoinj.base.Network;
010import org.bitcoinj.base.exceptions.AddressFormatException;
011import org.bitcoinj.core.NetworkParameters;
012
013import java.io.IOException;
014
015/**
016 * Key Deserializer to support using Address as the key in a Map.
017 */
018public class AddressKeyDeserializer extends KeyDeserializer {
019    private final AddressParser addressParser;
020
021    /**
022     * Construct an address deserializer that will deserialize addresses for the default supported networks.
023     * See {@link Network} to understand what the supported networks are.
024     */
025    public AddressKeyDeserializer() {
026        this(AddressParser.getDefault());
027    }
028
029    /**
030     * Construct an address KeyDeserializer with a custom {@link AddressParser}
031     * @param addressParser parser to convert a string to an address
032     */
033    public AddressKeyDeserializer(AddressParser addressParser) {
034        this.addressParser = addressParser;
035    }
036
037    /**
038     * Construct an address KeyDeserializer that validates addresses for the specified {@link Network}.
039     * When deserializing addresses, addresses that are not from the specified network will cause a
040     * {@link InvalidFormatException} to be thrown during deserialization.
041     *
042     * @param network specify the only network we will deserialize addresses for.
043     */
044    public AddressKeyDeserializer(Network network) {
045        this( (network != null)
046                ? AddressParser.getDefault(network)
047                : AddressParser.getDefault());
048    }
049
050    /**
051     * @deprecated use {@link #AddressKeyDeserializer(Network)}
052     */
053    @Deprecated
054    public AddressKeyDeserializer(NetworkParameters netParams) {
055        this(netParams.network());
056    }
057
058    @Override
059    public Object deserializeKey(String key, DeserializationContext ctxt) throws IOException, JsonProcessingException {
060        try {
061            return addressParser.parseAddress(key);
062        } catch (AddressFormatException afe) {
063            throw new InvalidFormatException(ctxt.getParser(), "Invalid Address: " + key, key, Address.class);
064        }
065    }
066}
